scripts.webpack: webpack --entry ./direct.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/direct && webpack --entry ./index.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/index && webpack --entry ./direct-less-imports.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/direct-less-imports
scripts.parcel: PARCEL_WORKERS=0 parcel build ./index.js --log-level error --no-source-maps --no-cache --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/index && PARCEL_WORKERS=0 parcel build ./direct.js --log-level error --no-source-maps --no-cache --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/direct && PARCEL_WORKERS=0 parcel build ./direct-less-imports.js --log-level error --no-source-maps --no-cache --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/direct-less-imports
scripts.bundle: rm -rf bundler-dist && npm run webpack && npm run esbuild && npm run parcel && tree -sh bundler-dist
